Bindings.Binding:
local L = Blitz.Locals local id = GetQuestID()
if id > 0 then Blitz.Button:OnClick() Blitz.Button:SetChecked(not Blitz.Button:GetChecked())
ChatFrame_DisplaySystemMessageInPrimary(Blitz:IsEnabled(id) and L.AutomationOn or L.AutomationOff) PlaySound(SOUNDKIT.GS_TITLE_OPTION_OK) else ChatFrame_DisplaySystemMessageInPrimary(L.NoQuest) PlaySound(GetRandomArrayEntry({2317, 2951, 2607, 2459, 1906, 1614}))
if not PlaySound(SOUNDKIT.UI_GARRISON_ARCHITECT_TABLE_BUILDING_PLACEMENT_ERROR) then PlaySound(SOUNDKIT.IG_MAINMENU_CLOSE) end end
